abstract: South Korea’s financial regulator said Friday it might decide in September whether to approve HSBC Holdings‘ bid to buy Korea Exchange Bank, suggesting some progress in the long-running takeover saga.
lead_paragraph: South Korea’s financial regulator said Friday it might decide in September whether to approve HSBC Holdings‘ bid to buy Korea Exchange Bank, suggesting some progress in the long-running takeover saga.

headline.main: South Korea to Review HSBC’s Bank Bid
